title: The CIA agent confesses to the deathbed: 'We blew up WTC7 on 9/11'?
subtitle: Reports that a dying CIA agent confessed to blowing up Building 7 on September 11 through controlled demolitions are false news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The CIA agent who's dying confessed to blowing up the WCT 7 building on September 11th through its controlled demolition operations.
